item.title: CVE-2023-49855|2024-09-30T18:58:05.374Z -- binarycarpenter -- menu%20bar%20cart%20icon%20for%20woocommerce%20by%20binary%20carpenter
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in BinaryCarpenter Menu Bar Cart Icon For WooCommerce By Binary Carpenter.This issue affects Menu Bar Cart Icon For WooCommerce By Binary Carpenter: from n/a through 1.49.3.
